00013 using namespace apache::thrift;

00015 using namespace apache::thrift::transport;
00016 using namespace apache::thrift::server;
00017 using boost::shared_ptr;

00019 using namespace kumonosu;
00020 
00021 class ExampleClass {
00022 public:
00023     ExampleClass() {}
00024     ~ExampleClass() {}
00025     void innerCallbackFunction(arguments testArgs) {}
00026     void innerCallbackFunctionTwo(arguments testArgs) {}
00027     static void callbackFunction(void *object, arguments argList)
00028     {
00029         ExampleClass *myClass = (ExampleClass *)object;
00030         myClass->innerCallbackFunction(argList);
00031     }
00032     static void callbackFunctionTwo(void *object, arguments argList)
00033     {
00034         ExampleClass *myClass = (ExampleClass *)object;
00035         myClass->innerCallbackFunctionTwo(argList);
00036     }
00037 };
00038 
00039 void*
00040 runServer(void* arg)
00041 {
00042     TSimpleServer *server;
00043     server = (TSimpleServer *) arg;
00044     server->serve();
00045 }

00047 void
00048 MessageProcessorTest::constructorTest()
00049 {
00050     ExampleClass* example = new ExampleClass();
00051     MessageProcessor* processor = new MessageProcessor((void *)example,
00052                                                        &ExampleClass::
00053                                                        callbackFunction);
00054 
00055     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(processor != NULL);
00056 }

00058 void
00059 MessageProcessorTest::setClientTest()
00060 {
00061     ExampleClass* example = new ExampleClass();
00062     MessageProcessor* processor = new MessageProcessor((void *)example,
00063                                                        &ExampleClass::
00064                                                        callbackFunction);
00065 
00066     Client* client = new Client(1);
00067     processor->setClient(client);
00068 
00069     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(client != NULL &&
00070                    processor != NULL);
00071 }

00073 void
00074 MessageProcessorTest::setMethodCallbackTest()
00075 {
00076     ExampleClass* example = new ExampleClass();
00077     MessageProcessor* processor = new MessageProcessor((void *)example,
00078                                                        &ExampleClass::
00079                                                        callbackFunction);
00080     processor->setMethodCallback(1,
00081                                  (void *)example,
00082                                  &ExampleClass::callbackFunctionTwo);
00083     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(processor != NULL);
00084 }

00091                                                        &ExampleClass::

00093     processor->setMethodCallback(1,
00094                                  (void *)example,
00095                                  &ExampleClass::callbackFunctionTwo);
00096

00098 
00099     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(processor != NULL);

00102 void
00103 MessageProcessorTest::processPendingItemsTest()
00104 {
00105     ExampleClass* example = new ExampleClass();
00106     MessageProcessor* processor = new MessageProcessor((void *)example,
00107                                                        &ExampleClass::
00108                                                        callbackFunction);
00109     processor->setMethodCallback(1,
00110                                  (void *)example,
00111                                  &ExampleClass::callbackFunctionTwo);
00112     Client* client = new Client(1);
00113     processor->setClient(client);
00114 
00115     pthread_t serverThread;
00116     RequestQueue* iqueue = new RequestQueue();
00117     RequestQueue* oqueue = new RequestQueue();
00118     RequestQueue* imqueue = new RequestQueue();
00119 
00120     shared_ptr<LocalRequestManagerHandler> handler
00121         (new LocalRequestManagerHandler(iqueue, oqueue, imqueue));
00122     shared_ptr<TProcessor> serverProcessor
00123         (new LocalRequestManagerProcessor(handler));
00124     shared_ptr<TServerTransport> transport(new TServerSocket(9191));
00125     shared_ptr<TTransportFactory> transportFactory
00126         (new TBufferedTransportFactory());
00127     shared_ptr<TProtocolFactory> protocolFactory(new TBinaryProtocolFactory());
00128 
00129     TSimpleServer *testServer = new TSimpleServer(serverProcessor,
00130                                                   transport,
00131                                                   transportFactory,
00132                                                   protocolFactory);
00133 
00134     pthread_create(&serverThread, NULL, runServer, (void*) testServer);
00135     sleep(2);
00136 
00137     client->connect();
00138 
00139     queueItem item_one;
00140     queueItem item_two;
00141     item_one.methodId = 1;
00142     item_two.methodId = 1;
00143     
00144     iqueue->addItem(1, &item_one);
00145     iqueue->addItem(1, &item_two);
00146     
00147     processor->processPendingItems(-1);
00148 
00149     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(client != NULL &&
00150                    testServer != NULL &&
00151                    processor != NULL);
00152 
00153     client->disconnect();
00154 
00155     testServer->stop();
00156     sleep(2);
00157 
00158     delete testServer;
00159 }
